item.description: <p> Original song arranging & jamming. This is an basically acoustic meetup here.  Rehearsal of songs for performance. Generally, newcomers, intermediates and free style jamming starts at 2PM, and Rehearsal for Open mikes, shows around 3:00. Bring music sheets of your songs if possible. All musician levels welcome & encouraged. Lessons in theory or practice, music genres, or jamming if appropriate. Directions will be emailed to attendees the night before or morning (by 10AM) of the meetup.</p>
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be sent out Saturday night

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam / Music Rehearsal
